extra query request implementation in daemon code. it's kind of MVC
here, command line and socket server are just two different controllers
on top of the Gmail::Reports model class.

commit_list.message:
loop over results until blank line

to allow for multi line responses. the protocol than is something like:

request ->
        <-  response
        <-  response
        <-  ''
request ->
        <-  response
        <-  ''

commit_list.message:
new: cluster

build nested command namespaces simply by stacking cluster call like:
    Applix.main
        cluster :foo do
            cluster :bar do
                handle :task {...}
            end
        end
    end

to handle a

    $ app foo bar task p1 p2

command line.

commit_list.message:
added parse method to map txt to named ranges

ranges are now changed to have the last day excluded. Means the week goes from monday to monday, not sunday. And a month is from 1st to 1st. This is because the range calculations always exclude the last day.
